channel.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
channel.description: He attacked Stalin and put Germany into one of the worst depressions it has seen. But seriously, who fauking attacks Stalin?!

item.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

There were rumors that Hitler was one-quarter Jewish and that his grandmother, Maria Schicklgruber, became pregnant while working as a servant in a Jewish household. The implications of these rumors were politically explosive for the proponent of a racist and antisemitic ideology. Opponents tried to prove that Hitler had Jewish or Czech ancestors. Although these rumors were never confirmed, for Hitler they were reason enough to conceal his origins.

Read full topic
item.source: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler

item.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Really, the system in Nazi Germany was based on genetics. Many people had to prove they were Aryan, by showing their family trees. So you really expect that the highest leader, the Führer, was related to a jew?

Read full topic
item.source: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler

item.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:59, topic:253255”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=334563.msg2616563#msg2616563 date=1231077557]

He, his father wasn’t a jew. Maybe, just maybe someone in his family was, but his father wasn’t.

I never said his dad was a jew, because his dad wasn’t. His dad’s dad was a jew, meaning his granddad was.

There is no evidence of this. These things, along with him being gay or him having sex with retards (I just came up with those two) are after-war propaganda. He can’t defend himself anymore, and it’s wrong to talk bad about the dead, isn’t it.

Maybe the holocaust of the jews was also after-war propaganda?

Nah. But almost everyone is taught that Hitler was a jew, he was gay, or that shit. But if you had half a brain, you’d know that it’s quite stupid to think that he was a jew. How the hell do you want to achieve what he did, while being a jew?
[/quote]
His mother was a jew.[/quote]
I heard is grandfather was a jew O_o
I dunno, maybe in the mothers genes.

Read full topic
item.source: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler

He, his father wasn’t a jew. Maybe, just maybe someone in his family was, but his father wasn’t.

I never said his dad was a jew, because his dad wasn’t. His dad’s dad was a jew, meaning his granddad was.

There is no evidence of this. These things, along with him being gay or him having sex with retards (I just came up with those two) are after-war propaganda. He can’t defend himself anymore, and it’s wrong to talk bad about the dead, isn’t it.

Maybe the holocaust of the jews was also after-war propaganda?
[/quote]

Nah. But almost everyone is taught that Hitler was a jew, he was gay, or that shit. But if you had half a brain, you’d know that it’s quite stupid to think that he was a jew. How the hell do you want to achieve what he did, while being a jew?[/quote]
His mother was a jew.

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:56, topic:253255”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=334563.msg2615197#msg2615197 date=1230989271]

He, his father wasn’t a jew. Maybe, just maybe someone in his family was, but his father wasn’t.

I never said his dad was a jew, because his dad wasn’t. His dad’s dad was a jew, meaning his granddad was.

There is no evidence of this. These things, along with him being gay or him having sex with retards (I just came up with those two) are after-war propaganda. He can’t defend himself anymore, and it’s wrong to talk bad about the dead, isn’t it.
[/quote]

Maybe the holocaust of the jews was also after-war propaganda?[/quote]

Nah. But almost everyone is taught that Hitler was a jew, he was gay, or that shit. But if you had half a brain, you’d know that it’s quite stupid to think that he was a jew. How the hell do you want to achieve what he did, while being a jew?

item.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:253255”]On the other hand, he was a genius and knew what he was doing, even if it was bad.

And he took Germany out of there depression.[/quote]

He not only took germany out of the depression…he took germany out of the depression and got it ready for war in just 3 years.
Germany had been struggling for over 10 years to recover from depression…let alone could it take on another war.

Read full topic

item.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

One of the most frequently asked questions we receive is whether Adolf Hitler was Jewish or had ancestors who were. The idea seems to arise from the remote possibility that Hitler's grandfather was Jewish. Hitler's father, Alois, was registered as an illegitimate child with no father. Alois' mother worked in the home of a wealthy Jew and there is some chance a son in that household got the woman (i.e., Hitler's grandmother) pregnant. Adolf Hitler was not Jewish.

Read full topic
item.source: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler

Hitler attacked Stalin, because he was afraid Stalin would attack him. I have no idea if Stalin was about to, but it was too much for Germany.

item.title: Why it's stupid to have respect for Hitler
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

No matter what your political stance is, one must admit Hitler was no doubt one of the most intelligent strategists that ever lived. He brought Germany out of a huge depression due to an unfair Treaty of WWI, cleansed his lands, and forced his entire country to become a formidable power. He took over France with a mere lifting of a finger! - That’s very impressive. Without him, the US would not be what it is today and Germany would most likely be a 3rd world hell-hole.

Read full topic
